Text:
Dlja teh u kogo ne rabotaet obraz cherez DT:
1. Montiruem obraz v DT ili Alcohol (poslednie versii)
2. Snimaem novij obraz so smontirovannogo, no (VAZHNO!) v optiyah stavim StarForce
3. Poluchaem MDF takogo zhe razmera, a vot MDS budet okolo 8 kb, vmesto ~35
4. Montiruem poluchennij obraz v DT/Alcohol
5. Igraem :)
Ofigennaya igra

---

For those who can't run it via DT / Alcohol:
1. Mount into DT/Alcohol (make sure there're last versions)
2. Create new dvd image from mounted. Don't forget to set in the options StarForce (this's the key to all)
3. You'll get 2 files - MDF with the exactly same size (but slightly different content) and MDS with size near 8 kb instead of ~35
4. Mount new image
5. Play :)
Awesome game
thanks for the english localisation idea.. and the one for DT too ^^ both helped
